answers.answer: Just took the 3 hour get my results friday.

I failed both. I was upset at first but then I realized how common gestational diabetes is. But a lot of women fail the 1 hr and pass the 3. If you fail you will see a nutritionist and be taught what you can and can not eat. Low sugars and low carbs. That's The hardest part!  And you will need too take your blood glucose 4 times a day. With my doctor the perk was I started weekly ultrasounds right away to monitor her heart, lungs, and size. As long as you exercise and follow the diet you will do great!  Just will have a big baby.
Lots and lots  of people fail the one hour and then pass the three hour, try not to worry yet!
I failed the 1 hr test but then passed the 3 hr one

I failed both test. I am now monitoring my blood sugar levels to see if I need insulin.  So far, so good. I have been avoiding sugar and carbs. I am going to start adding small carbs to my meal today to see if I will spike. It's only been 4 days for me.I think part of the reason I failed was because of the food I ate the day before.
I also failed the one hour but then I passed the the hour. I barely passed the three hour but I did lol.

I failed both and was devastated until I spoke with my dietician. I can still eat everything I like but in very small portions and in moderation. I also have to prick my finger 4x a day and take a pill at night to keep my morning reading stable. Just like NewMom said, seeing your baby every week is a perk and I enjoy it. You can still deliver vaginally, depending on the size of the baby. Good luck, mama!

I have gestational diabetes at 8 weeks ....***** it really does because as a woman prego you want to be able to satisfy your cravings and you simply cant. I feel more on a restricted diet...who doesnt love carbs and sweets.... this time around my pregnancy is just not that sweet....

The exercise part will be hard because I have pre term labor and been to l&d twice and had the shot to stop it. I'm nervous and scared of having a huge baby.. :/ I'm not a big girl but I'm not small either..
Is there different levels of gestational diabeties? Like insulin dependent?
If you can't control your diabetes by yourself,  that's when they give you insulin.  Most of the time you can control it with a good diet. I failed my one hour but passed my 3 hour test :) good luck!
I'm crossing my fingers I pass. I'm so nervous..
I failed the 1 hour test but passed the 3 hour test. There's hope! Good luck!

Im also checking my sugar level daily before fasting and after 2hrs of breakfast. Mostly i get 91 to 95 in morning  and after breakfast its 86 to 98. Idk if its fine or not I'll be meeting my dr on monday..

question: Dr said I failed my 1 hr and now have to do a 3 hr test. Any ladies fail the 3 hr? What should I know if I fail my 3hr?
title: failed 1 hr sugar test :/
